ai.title: feat: Significant expansion of CodeDescribe functionality
ai.body:
This PR represents a major update to CodeDescribe, adding significant new features and functionality.  The changes include:

* Extensive additions to CodeDescribe's internal data structures and logging mechanisms, as evidenced by the numerous additions to `.codescribe/history/*.json` files and `.codescribe/logs/codescribe.log`.
* Enhancements to the `linear_agent.js` component, suggesting improvements to the core logic or agent behavior.
* Updated documentation in `CODESCRIBE_COMMAND_REFERENCE.md` and `docs/PLUGIN_DEVELOPMENT.md` to reflect these changes.  The documentation updates indicate a significant increase in the number of available commands and/or plugin development options.

The sheer volume of changes (over 10,000 lines inserted) suggests a substantial overhaul or feature addition rather than minor bug fixes or refactoring.  Please review thoroughly, paying particular attention to the documentation updates to understand the implications of this release.
ai.summary: Major update to CodeDescribe adding significant new features and expanding its functionality.

pr.title: feat: Significant expansion of CodeDescribe functionality
pr.body:
This PR represents a major update to CodeDescribe, adding significant new features and functionality.  The changes include:

* Extensive additions to CodeDescribe's internal data structures and logging mechanisms, as evidenced by the numerous additions to `.codescribe/history/*.json` files and `.codescribe/logs/codescribe.log`.
* Enhancements to the `linear_agent.js` component, suggesting improvements to the core logic or agent behavior.
* Updated documentation in `CODESCRIBE_COMMAND_REFERENCE.md` and `docs/PLUGIN_DEVELOPMENT.md` to reflect these changes.  The documentation updates indicate a significant increase in the number of available commands and/or plugin development options.

The sheer volume of changes (over 10,000 lines inserted) suggests a substantial overhaul or feature addition rather than minor bug fixes or refactoring.  Please review thoroughly, paying particular attention to the documentation updates to understand the implications of this release.
